Name: Chatot Scarf
LongDescription: May make the Pokémon bounce received moves back at the attacker. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Chatot.  Finding a Chatot Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
